price: O size, sadece kötülüğü, hayasızlığı ve Allah hakkında bilmediğiniz şeyleri söylemenizi emreder.
arabic: إِنَّمَا يَأۡمُرُكُم بِٱلسُّوٓءِ وَٱلۡفَحۡشَآءِ وَأَن تَقُولُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innamā yamurukum bil-sūi wal-faḥshāi wa-an taqūlū ʿalā al-lahi mā lā taʿlamūna
